title: try...catch...finally
description: The `try...catch...finally` JS syntax statement executes code in the `try` block, handles exceptions in the `catch` block if any occur and executes the `finally` block regardless of whether an exception was thrown.
content: The statement used for handling exceptions. The `try` block contains code that may throw an error. The `catch` block executes if an error occurs, enabling to handle the error. The `finally` block contains code that runs after the `try` and `catch` blocks, regardless of whether an error was thrown or not.
